mods.abstract: RUNAWAYS, -- FROM the residence of the undersigned in Prairie Chataignier, on the 25th ult., two negro men. One being a griff 5 feet 7 or 8 inches high, stout built and about 35 years old, speaking English only : ke know how to read andwrite. The other is not quite so tall, is of black color, about 40 yeass old, has a remarkably high forehead, and speaks the English language generally. A liberal reward will be giving to any one who will either lodge then in jail, or deliver said negroes to the undersigned. JEAN PIERRE LAFLEUR. St. Landry, March 3rd, 1860.--tf

recordInfo.recordOrigin: Transformed into MODS from extended Dublin Core by the LDL Development Team at Louisiana State University.
